about_the_game:
Copenhagen Airport, Kastrup, (IATA: CPH, ICAO: EKCH) as the principal international gateway for Copenhagen, Denmark, and a significant portion of southern Sweden, stands as a historic landmark being one of Europe's oldest international airports.


Copenhagen Airport is made out of 2 terminals with a total of 76 gates. These terminals include…
  • Terminal 2 - is the older of the two international terminals and it operates international flights on behalf of all airlines except SAS and all Star Alliance partners
  • Terminal 3 - is the newest terminal, having been completed in 1998. It operates international flights on behalf of SAS and all Star Alliance partners.

Runways
Copenhagen Airport is an airport made out of 4 runways

  • Runway 22L
  • Runway 04R
  • Runway 22R
  • Runway 04L
  • Runway 12
  • Runway 30

Renowned for its bustling activity, it managed 30 million passengers in 2018, marking it as Scandinavia's premier airport for international travel. Occupying 11.8 square kilometers (4.6 sq mi) on Amager Island, conveniently close to Copenhagen's city center, it's predominantly located within Tårnby municipality, with a smaller segment in Dragør.

This airport is distinctive for its high volume of international passengers relative to other Scandinavian airports. It supports approximately 60 airlines, boasts an operational capacity of 83 flights per hour, and is equipped with 108 jet bridges along with supplementary remote parking stands. Operated by Københavns Lufthavne, which also administers Roskilde Airport, Copenhagen Airport is a significant employer in the region with a workforce of 1,700.

name: Tower! Simulator 3 - EKCH Airport

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: [ [b]EKCH[/b] ] as the principal international gateway for Copenhagen, Denmark. Ever wondered what's it like to be in the life of a Danish air traffic controller? Control at this airport add-on for Tower! Simulator 3, where on a busy day there are about 850 take-offs and landings.
